page.title: 11Education
page.content: The senior school is called Ridgeway, it replaced a grammar school at Marlborough and another school at Burderop. The school is 18 years old and was founded in 1967. About 38 percent of the pupils who start in the first year leave school in the upper sixth form. Out of all the pupils at Ridgeway 16% go to college, 25% find jobs, 13% go on the YTS and 8% are unknown. 62% of the pupils who start in the first year leave school in the fifth year. The school has about 69 staff. The majority of the pupils come to school by bus as they live in outlying villages.
